questions.text: Welcome to Jungle Expedition! Do you want to play?
You are traveling down a river in a boat to a rest stop. There is a fork in the river. Do you take a left (yes) or right (no)?
Taking a left on the river leads to a muddy section with a tree blocking your path. Do you get into the water to remove the tree?
Taking a right on the river leads to a crocodile pit. Will you fight the crocodiles?
You take some time to remove the tree, but eventually, it pays off as the path leads straight to the rest point. <YOU WIN>
Waiting for aid in removing the tree leads to mass starvation. <THE END>
You are eaten by the crocodiles. <THE END>
You are eaten by crocodiles. <THE END>
